JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated :  4.12.2006 
 
Circular No. 24/ 2006 
 
Subject :- Access control to airside. 
 
In order to  ensure that  proper  access control  is  enforced  at  all access 
points leading to airside,  only  certified  screeners (Not necessarily X-ray 
screening), shall be  deployed for security checks of  persons, vehicles and 
personnel belongings  at the access points including   through the  cargo 
warehouse. 
 
The above instructions   shall be implemented  with immediate effect. 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
